original_text: One who heard us was a woman named Lydia, from the city of Thyatira, a seller of purple goods, who was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to pay attention to what was said by Paul.
korean_text: 두아디라 시에 있는 자색 옷감 장사로서 하나님을 섬기는 루디아라 하는 한 여자가 말을 듣고 있을 때 주께서 그 마음을 열어 바울의 말을 따르게 하신지라

sentences.original_text: One who heard us was a woman named Lydia
who was a worshiper of God
to pay attention to what was said by Paul
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 바울의 말에 주의를 기울이게 하기 위해
